thread.title: Truck driver loses control on icy road and crashes into police SUV
thread.title_full: Truck driver loses control on icy road and crashes into police SUV

author: Rhys Jones
title: Truck driver loses control on icy road and crashes into police SUV
text:
[Independent TV](/tv)
Showing now | News
00:37
Truck driver loses control on icy road and crashes into police SUV
A truck driver has been cited for careless
[driving](/topic/driving) after losing control on an icy highway near Suttle Lake, [Oregon](/topic/oregon), and crashing into an Oregon State Police SUV.
Black Butte Ranch Police released a body-camera video of the incident adding that it’s a “reminder to slow down well below the speed limit when you see emergency lights. Our lives are in your hands.”
The swerving truck also crashed into a Black Butte Ranch Fire Department ambulance.
Three medics and a patient from the first crash were in the back of the ambulance, but no one was injured, police said.
